title: MyPet的玄学权限问题
author: 小张up
txt_content:
mypet最新版
gm权限组插件
paper1.12.2
给予玩家mypet.command.*权限后，还是提示没权限
mypet.shops.*也一样的结果

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
